A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a good Star Wars movie\, but not a great one. It's hard to live up to the expectations of hard core fans\, while trying to recruit a new generation. There were sparks of greatness\, drug down by a needless storyline that took extraneous characters on a mission that didn't effect the final outcome of the movie. Great performance by Mark Hamill who takes the character to unexpected places that may not conform to the wishes of the congregation. It might not hit the lofty myth making heights of the originals\, but it outpaces the prequels by a wide margin.
